attributes.action: gain assurances from the BBC that when Formula 1 (F1) coverage returns to the corporation in 2009 that the classic Fleetwood Mac "The Chain" theme music is retained.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Formula 1 (F1) coverage will be returning to the BBC from the start of the 2009 season.

It would only be right that the theme music for the coverage retains the classic BBC theme music of "The Chain" by Fleetwood Mac in the original, unaltered, unadulterated form.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
